titles.title: Free Speech Defense Act
Free Speech Defense Act
To prohibit agencies from taking certain action relating to social media companies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
